description: Building full-stack React apps with routing, API routes, and SSR/SSG.
Creating REST APIs, handling routing, and managing middleware and authentication.
Writing interactive frontend logic and working with the DOM and async calls.
Creating dynamic user interfaces using components, hooks, and state management.
Working with Hugging Face, Ollama, and other OSS model platforms for local AI.
Securing web apps using JWT, OAuth, session-based auth, and role-based access.
Building static web pages using semantic HTML and responsive styling with CSS.
Navigating servers and automating tasks using bash scripts and command-line tools.
Traversing, building, and optimizing data in trees and graphs using DFS, BFS, etc.
Writing queries, joins, subqueries, and understanding schema design.
Understanding indexing, slicing, and common operations on arrays and strings.
Using OpenAI's agent framework to create persistent assistants with tools and memory.
Using Git for version control and collaborating through GitHub repositories and PRs.
Composing chains of LLM tasks, tools, and agents to build AI workflows.
Generating vector representations and storing/searching them in vector databases.
Automating testing and deployments using pipelines like GitHub Actions or Vercel CI.
Using object-relational mapping tools to interact with databases in code.
Working with flexible schemas, aggregation pipelines, and document-based storage.
Designing effective prompts for language models to produce reliable outputs.
Using Postgres features like indexes, constraints, and functions for scalable DBs.
